title: Alexis Sánchez
summary: Alexis Alejandro Sánchez Sánchez (Spanish pronunciation: [aˈleksis ˈsantʃes]; born 19 December 1988), also known mononymously as Alexis, is a Chilean professional footballer who plays as a forward for Serie A club Inter Milan and the Chile national team. He is considered by many to be among the best players of his generation and often lauded as the greatest Chilean player of all time.[5][6][7][8][9]
